text: 1.10: Wkp 16.17; VB 8.3-4Mbe ne suaŋgiap, mba tuk hɨgim, Sekaraia vov Fhe Bakɨme phena vhen vergap, Fhe Bakɨme nzuav ndɨga vhuuŋ hi khan nana mpooi. Ana khan nanan mpooim, mba Fhe Bakɨme ndikndigap ana zɨ ndi vun fi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe ana rargap Fhe Bakɨme phena bɨna vhen kav, Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuai.
